Name: Ord.
About the game: Ord. is a game full of tiny text adventures. Whether it is embarking on a quest to defeat an evil warlock or creating your own world as a god, Ord. tells stories that emphasize player choices and evocative fast-paced narratives. Features: 5 unique text adventures. Steam Workshop support - create and share your own stories! Localization in German, French, Russian, Japanese, and Spanish languages.
